Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product not only offers unparalleled functionality but also represents a significant investment in innovation and quality. Given its exceptional features and the time and resources we've dedicated to its development, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering all these factors, we're offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $10000. We're confident that you'll find immense value in this offering and appreciate the opportunity to make it a part of your collection. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $15,000
